  • Package logic

    • Class logic.Character extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • representation

          char representation
          The element's representation in-game

        • posX

          int posX
          The element's x-axis position's value

        • posY

          int posY
          The element's y-axis position's value

        • generator

          java.util.Random generator
          A random number generator to be used by enemies whose movement is not certain

    • Class logic.Drunken extends Guard implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • invertedDirection

          boolean invertedDirection
          If set to true, then the Drunken guard is moving in the opposite direction to the default one

        • sleep

          boolean sleep

    • Class logic.DungeonLevel extends Level implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • guardGenerator

          Used to randomly choose a type of guard for the level if user didn't choose one

        • nextLevel

          Custom next level. Used in case user creates a new KeepLevel

    • Class logic.Guard extends Character implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • movements

          int[][] movements
          The Guard's pre-determined set of movements. Depending on the Guard type, they can be done in a reverse order

        • movementIndex

          int movementIndex
          Holds the index to the Guard's next movement in his routine

    • Class logic.Level extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • heroHasKey

          boolean heroHasKey
          Holds information about whether the hero has collected the level key or not

          Level.LevelState levelStatus
          Holds informations about the current level situation

          int levelIndex
          An unique index. Used for Unit testing purposes only

        • map

          Map map
          The level's map

        • hero

          Hero hero
          The game's hero (present on all levels)

    • Class logic.Map extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable
